title: Kim Yung-kil
text: Kim Yung-kil (born 29 January 1944) is a <a href="North%20Korea">North Korea</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who played for <a href="North%20Korea%20national%20football%20team">North Korea</a> in the <a href="1966%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1966 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="Pyongyang%20Sports%20Club">Pyongyang Sports Club</a>.
